dt: {bc}an instrument for measuring luminous intensity, luminous flux, illumination, or brightness

shortdef: an instrument for measuring luminous intensity, luminous flux, illumination, or brightness

dt: {bc}a spectrophotometer in which a spray of metallic salts in solution is vaporized in a very hot flame and subjected to quantitative analysis by measuring the intensities of the spectral lines of the metals present

shortdef: a spectrophotometer in which a spray of metallic salts in solution is vaporized in a very hot flame and subjected to quantitative analysis by measuring the intensities of the spectral lines of the metals present
